titleStmt.title: [An exact] relation of the several engagements and actions of His Majesties fleet, under the command of His Highness Prince Rupert and of all circumstances concerning this summers expedition, anno 1673 / written by a person in command in the fleet.
titleStmt.author: Person in command of the fleet.

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England (reel 867:17) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2977:1).
Wing lists copies of 2 editions of this book under one number. The Folger copies of these 2 editions have been arbitrarily assigned Wing number E3696 and Wing number E3696a.
Imperfect: first two words on t.p. cropped.
